## Source: ossf-package-analysis (25e65ca84d64481a7631998dd140a2b8cecaa7b5716bb71dc08ff53e700a10aa)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'realtime-demo' @ 99.11.9 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
